title: Handle a Player's Retirement
description: A long-time veteran player announces their retirement. The team must process the retirement and plan a farewell ceremony.

tasks.description: Process the player's retirement paperwork with the league.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the official retirement forms.

tasks.description: Update the team's official roster, removing the player.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the roster, freeing up a spot.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the events team to plan a pre-game farewell ceremony for the player at an upcoming game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent works with the events team to schedule and plan the ceremony.
